name: Frozen Slime
description:
You (a slime) are short on money and decide to go to the artic to find a legendary gem to pay all your debts and buy something more.

When you find the cave where the gem is you also discover that it's going to melt soon,so you must hurry up before every part melts.

Controls:

- Move: Arrow keys / ASD

- Jump: Space Bar / Up Key / W
